48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sirmah narrated from Abu Ayyub, that:when death reached him, he said: “I have concealed something I heard from the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) from you. I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying: ‘If you did not sin, Allah would create a creation that would sin, so He will forgive them.’”

chapter.eng-name: "If You Did Not Sin, Allah Would Create A Creation That Would Sin So He Will Forgive Them"
